name: Federal Highways Road Construction
description: We the senate instruct the Prime Minister to do all in its power to build up the Federal Highways district to a propper designed and functional road. This highway shall be at the same hight as the capital and includes bridges and/or tunnels where needed. The prime minister shall make regulations for the precise design of the highways and hire Federal Civil Servants to assist in the work of constuction. The Prime Minister is responsible for the work the civil Servants do and shall verify all regulations and laws are followed in the process of constructing the highways.Federal Civil Servents recieve a standart payment for laying down both stone roads and asphalt. The exact compensation for those can be set by the prime minister with chat commands altough they always should be higher then 0. If this price included the price of materials/tools is fully up to the prime minister themselves. The prime minister can give out seperate contracts for additional payments in case of constuction of tunnels and bridges in case they determin those are needed.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon>: Was the block constructed or deconstructed?

properties.Title: Stone Ramp (Tracking)
properties.UserDescription: Track placement of stone ramps. Note that the logic here is specifically designed to counteract a game bug with stone ramps (issue #19473). Only applies for federal roads as capitol should not have need of ramps.
